channel.title: Axoloti distanceSensor problem
channel.description:
Hi
a arduino nano reads a distanceSensor and transmits the data via Serial to my Axoloti. Seems to work somehow, besides that I get a lot of "noise" here? how can that be? what could cause this?
take a look at chart10 and the serialMonotor at the right. those are exactly the values that are send via Serial.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=09qMXaveZEQ

item.title: Axoloti distanceSensor problem
item.dc:creator: @AdmiralCrunch
item.description:
@AdmiralCrunch wrote:

Hi

a arduino nano reads a distanceSensor and transmits the data via Serial to my Axoloti. Seems to work somehow, besides that I get a lot of "noise" here? how can that be? what could cause this?

take a look at chart10 and the serialMonotor at the right. those are exactly the values that are send via Serial.
